title: ServiceSpecification
description: The document representation of the Service Specification of a Service.

contentVersion.description: The version of the schema that a document conforms to.

identifier.description: The unique identifier for the service registered with Azure Deployment Manager.

description.description: A brief description for the service.

ownerGroupObjectId.description: The owner security group object identifier.

ownerGroupDisplayName.description: The display name for the owner group object identifier.

ownerGroupContactEmail.description: The email contact alias for the owner group.

policyCheckEnabled.description: The value indicating if all rollouts for this service should use a policy.
